# Issues from Github

[Issue #1](https://github.com/RedBug312/markdown-it-multimd-table/issues/1)

.
A    | B
-----|--
    0|1
.
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>A</th>
<th>B</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>0</td>
<td>1</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
.

.
    A|B
----:|:-
    0|1
.
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th style="text-align:right">A</th>
<th style="text-align:left">B</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:right">0</td>
<td style="text-align:left">1</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
.
